title: Permed, any assistance would be a HUGE PLUS.
body:
{{champion:35}}                                                   this will be fun.... 

so i'v been permed for the use of a third party program. I feel this was unfair in a way? i dont fully understand how a 3rd party program has been detected as i have not used one that i could see as a threat or/ application that could be used to give me an unfair advantage. 

i'v heard a lot about curse voice interfering with the bot detection system? but in no means am blaming it. i'v also used recording tools such as lolreplay/shadowplay in my passed 2 years of trying to climb. (Still silver xD)

i'v got a lot to talk about in regards to the topic... i'v spent a lot of my money which includes more then $2,000 and i would rather not say the exact.... as it would make me feel really uncomfortable making another account and spending time/money to play the game again. 

if any of this thread can relieve stress on me i would appreciate it, ..

 i dont want to play league anymore on my current build as im scared that my time would be wasted as i dont have the identity of the software that is causing me to be flagged? 

to whom it may concern,
 if this whole case doesn't answer  one question..... "what is the identity of the 3rd party program". i'll feel that i have to create more threads and emails to your colleagues at riot games, which i understand would get really annoying... but in a sense the paychecks you receive have been funded by clients such as myself who have supported riot financially over the passed 7 years. *cough *cough *i mean* {{champion:25}} q.

So..
show me you have a {{champion:136}}  do me a solid and resolve at least one of my questions......  i would like the identity of the third party program being used, that way it can be removed in a {{summoner:4}} ..... this would definitely {{summoner:13}} my thoughts. 

for those who think this is funny your right.... the jokes on me {{champion:35}} but i guess... being bronze for almost 5 seasons teaches you to vs enough {{champion:17}} to learn how to deal with cancer.

replies.body:
Update
+ Yo , riot if your not gonna respond. at least change my ban from 3rd party to something that'd make more sense... like toxicity, or carrying people in bronze/silver games... cause i mean.

Rip {{champion:35}} ... ill see another 900 games with you on my smurf if i bother.... playing this again.

 {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

Don't expect riot to respond, they have absolutely no idea what they are doing mate. They use bandaids to fix problems because it costs too much money to properly investigate what they need to in order to accurately balance this game, I have been playing this game for 5 years now and recently got permabanned for toxicity, what did I learn, let people shit all over you and smile or lose your account. They constantly ignore the fact that the big problems are still big problems and are still there 5 years later. One of the biggest causes of ill written text stems from their horrid match making which again in recent patches has once again been bandaided and still does not function. If they unban perma's it just proves they are wrong. no matter what it was that caused the action that brought about the ban in the first place. 
just play on your smurf mate and don't invest anymore cash into this game they will soon get the idea, I also lost almost 2 g over 5 years. shame is on you riot. Wanna ban someone permanently then refund what they have spent! no other company can recall their product without refunding why should you?

Had this happen to me on Wednesday. No possible clue what 3rd party program it would've been so I sent a support ticket. Got back general responses and it really felt like I was getting no support whatsoever. Truly frustrating.
Yeah your not getting anything but general copy pasted responses.

yep..... "they cannot disclose infomation about the 3rd party content as it could assist content creators.. xD does it look like i make mad hacks...and  i mean if i did, i definitely wouldn't use it on an acct ive wasted half my gaming life on.

funny thing is. my win rate has legit like... dropped the last 2 months xD

HACKS GIVE AN ADVANTAGE.... not make you lose more

The issue is the whole "we would be assisting scripters etc." excuses are bad, because that would just mean they have to advance their script detecting software, past finding 0 scripts.

Legitimately most ACTUAL scripters are found by PLAYER reports.

If you have any sources for this information I'd be very interested to see them. So far as I've seen, the automated detection rate is very good.

As for the excuse being bad, do you really think it's a good idea to tell these people who intentionally ruin games "hey, this is what  we can see you doing, so just don't do that ok?". At the end of the day, if the scripters know what has been detected then they know what hasn't, and how to get around the system the next time. 

Both the scripts and the detection methods evolve all the time. Better to not help out the scripters ey?

>if the scripters know what has been detected then they know what hasn't, and how to get around the system the next time.

This only forces riot to get better, and actually push finding scripters, the argument is invalid, considering the fact that if any scripts go undetected it's a failure on Riot's part.

And my Argument for the whole scripters are found by players, is that riot can't even curb level bots, so we know damn well they ain't detecting shit.

>Both the scripts and the detection methods evolve all the time. Better to not help out the scripters ey?

Script kiddies haven't been forced by Riot to evolve their scripting for forever, pretty sure they have stagnated on the same program for at least a few years, hell i'll openly admit that i did some scripting on a account in customs to see how they worked, and how obvious they are in reality, and considering that, the fact that riot can't stop them is kinda just pathetic.

Lacking inside information I'll comment no more on the scripting, and just agree to disagree there. I can see your point, and I can also see Riot's, but lacking anymore information there isn't anything else I could confidently say.

As for level bots, with how easy it is to make a new account, and how non-viable it is to do IP or location bans, levelling bots are a tricky thing to nail down. No matter how many they ban there will always be more, and for a game as large and widespread as LoL there will always be that shady side of the playerbase that just buys everything from accounts to boosts because they can and want it fast. 

Don't get me wrong, I can see why it looks like nothing is done, all I can really tell you is that I have seen one number for a bot ban wave and it was _large_.

>Don't get me wrong, I can see why it looks like nothing is done, all I can really tell you is that I have seen one number for a bot ban wave and it was large.

And should be done consistently and not in waves.

The fact that it was large goes against the fight against scripting etc. itself.
I really hope you get unbanned, that was surprisingly a fun read. Your op.gg seems clear too.

thanks buddy... i'v had my ups and downs with toxicity... i started uni this year and went through a major rough patch.. i feel real bad and have attempted to redeem myself... but i never thought ide be permed... i knew if i was it would be linked to the toxicity..

i sorta got the attitude of... i dont care that im banned. i care about.. why? ... "u know??"


thanks bro. enjoy man. and i hope too see you on the rift ^_^ you can hope right? just like when u ult with Karthus... or try steal baron with jinx like doublelift xD

new forum post coming up soon unless i get a response from RIOT.

all this talk about scripts, 
anyone in their right mind would see that.... more skillshots means more damage, more damage means more kills,more kills means more wins.

then why the heck is my win rate, kda rate still the same as it was 2 months ago? heck its even dropped.

ive been at uni more then ive been playing league.

Have you submitted a ticket to player support? That is the only way you'll guarantee a response from Riot.

Have you ever shared your account? That's usually what has happened in cases like this.
So many people every day, listen mate and understand this clearly, no matter what you got perma banned for, there is a 0% you are getting your account back, I'm sorry

Not true. If an investigation reveals doubt about the legitimacy of a ban it will be looked into further. Rare as it is, I have seen one or two people unbanned, once because it was an illegitimate ban that got caught up in manual, and another because the punishment was reduced to a 14 day as the behaviour was not severe enough to jump that tier.

That said, the 3rd party/scripting bans are generally the most accurate, and even behaviour bans are very rarely mistaken.

Usually what happens with third party bans is that they shared their account to be boosted (or to an asshole 'friend' or some such) and the other person using the account used 3rd party/scripts, hence the "I never used any of those things" in a lot of the ban posts we see on boards.

This individual case I dunno what the go is, doesn't look like he was boosted so may have just been good ol' account sharing, but either way, if he has submitted a support ticket then the ban has been checked and deemed still legitimate.

feared that. haha, ide atleast like to know what the issue was... i dont even have a clue as to what program got me banned. so if i was to make a smurf and spend time on it.... it would eventually get banned would it not?

thus making my argument again... and again......

im getting a new computer soon anyways, Riots just hurting themselves... i'v recruited almost 24 people into their game. which have moved on because of this crap.

+ +side is that now with my art i wont be working towards the goal of working for Riot.

now i can hope and dream to work somewhere better.

Sadly, your not getting shit from Riot.

Riot don't want to tell people what program the issue is, because the "scripters" and such are able to avoid using the issue programs and go undetected (Or so they say)

In reality it's just so they can avoid saying they fucked up, when the ban is being for nothing.

even then. i dont think that they fucked up. if something has been found that makes it seem like ive got an advantage. ide like it to be reviewed and talked to me about... rather then just keeping my acct banned.


 i'v had it for YEARS. ... i have over 108 days played.. IN GAME.... which equates to 2,500 + hours .... INSIDE of the game... :( 

im an animator.... and have taken all my inspiration from lol.... its gotten me to where i am today... i dropped out of school because of my passion..... (and other issues unrelated)   but my next major uni project is based on Ivern..... im legit about to have a breakdown... im probably going to redo all i have done.... and base it around something a lot worse because i feel that nothing beats the way Ivern's production has impacted on the game itself. 


you could probably begin to imagine the struggle im going through.
Thats a hell of a life wasted. 2,500 hours. please. go outside.. Riot is giving you a free ticket to a new life. damn dude.
you've played 2,705... Maybe we can try organise a ban for you and see how you react?
I wouldn't be mad, still a free ticket to a new life :')

The thing is, if you don't know why you were banned with regards to 3rd party programs, you weren't banned legitimately.

It's hard to not know what is a non-acceptable third party program.

Meaning Riot fucked up, and sadly, this sort of post is a regular occurrence, and so is the complete lack of actual information from Riot, other than "You were banned for third party programs"
{{champion:29}}  "Shooting (out bans) is easy.... Aiming is hard"
